description: The Iseo Long Cardigan Sweater is a casual and versatile layering piece made from ultra-soft, 100% merino wool. This relaxed fit sweater easily transitions from season to season and features a shawl-style collar and knitted in hand pockets. The ribbed long cuffs and hem provide a classic finish. <br><br>Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fibre that naturally resists odours, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Merino Iseo Long Cardigan Sweater - Womens
